definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: He gives a very good recipe for cakes .
sentences.chinese: 他传授了非常好的糕饼制法。

sentences.english: At long last, Lonnie is releasing his most cherished professional performance pices.
sentences.chinese: 他终于肯愿意传授他最专业的表演内容。

sentences.english: Eng. ) To teach the basic technique and concept of soil microbiology.
sentences.chinese: 传授研究土壤微生物之技术及观念。

sentences.english: Professor Teng taught us a lot.
sentences.chinese: 邓教授曾传授我们很多知識。

sentences.english: Amicus Plato Amicus Aristotle, send Magis Amicus Veritas .
sentences.chinese: 柏拉图，亚里士多德传授以马吉斯真理。
将你们的力量传授给她。

sentences.english: That's recognized method of teaching English.
sentences.chinese: 那是一种获得承认的英语传授法。

sentences.english: One way you can teach gratitude iy example.
sentences.chinese: 你传授感恩的一个方法就是自己树立榜样。

sentences.english: Flowers are often pollinated by bees.
sentences.chinese: 花常常由蜜蜂传授花粉。

sentences.english: Before 1900 many variations of jiujitsu were taught.
sentences.chinese: 1900年前，很多流派的柔术在传授。

sentences.english: University is not only to impart knowledge of the place, but is opting to place.
sentences.chinese: 大学不仅是传授知识的场所，而且是造就人才的地方。

sentences.english: Sedimentary rocks show pollen in very deep, "Precambrian" strata.
sentences.chinese: 水成岩指出了前寒武层的花粉传授。

sentences.english: These are the three things I'm trying to teach Wu Di through my experience.
sentences.chinese: 这三方面也是我现在要传授给吴迪的我的个人经验。

sentences.english: On the other hand there are some who try their best to work on the transmission of the dharma to the West.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，也有些上师尽己所能地传授佛法至西方。

sentences.english: I will teach my exper'ience to the per'son that I should get to know.
sentences.chinese: 我要向我结识的人传授我学英语的经验。
可以更加有效地传授知识吗？

definition: to point out/to indicate/to give directions/to show how (to do sth)/to censure/to pick at
to learn/to acquire (some skill through practice)/acquisition
to formally become an apprentice to a master
to hand down secret knowledge from generation to generation within a school or family etc
to learn a skill or art
to be a believer (in a religion, esp. Islam)
to create/to come up with (an idea etc)
to empty one's pocket/to give everything to help sb
what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
